About Me

Let me tell you a little about my self...

An energetic and young Web Developer with a passion for web application development. I am hard-working, very well organize and have an eye for detail. I have worked on many school projects using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, XML, PHP, and MySQL. I am open to learn new programming languages and looking for an entry level position, challenging environment to enhance my skills and experiences further.
